channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 Best Down Comforters (2025), Tested in Our Homes in Every Season
item.description: The best down comforters keep you cozy and comfortable no matter the season. After sleep testing multiple options, our top pick is the Premium from Qu...

item.title: 25 Best MagSafe Accessories (2025): Qi2 Chargers, Magnetic Wallets, and More
item.description: The weird, wonderful world of MagSafe accessories (Qi2 included) can make your phone feel modular. These are our favorites.

item.title: Chromebooks vs. PC: The Differences Between Chrome OS and Windows
item.description: If you're trying to decide between a Chromebook and a Windows laptop, some recent changes have shaken up how these two platforms compare.

item.title: Databricks will bake OpenAI models into its products in $100M bet to spur enterprise adoption
item.description: Databricks is on the hook to pay at least $100 million to OpenAI in this deal, even if customer usage falls short. It's a bet, but one that Databricks...

item.title: Meta rolls out Teen Accounts on Facebook and Messenger globally
item.description: Teen Accounts first rolled out to Instagram a year ago after Meta and other popular social networks were grilled by U.S. lawmakers for not doing enoug...

item.title: 12 Best Cheap Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From surprisingly good $300 Chromebooks to excellent $650 Windows laptops, these are the best budget laptops we’ve tested.

item.title: Clarifai’s new reasoning engine makes AI models faster and less expensive
item.description: The AI platform Clarifai has launched a new reasoning engine that it claims will make running AI models twice as fast and 40% less expensive.

item.title: AllTrails Hiking App Review: Outdoor Planning and Navigation
item.description: Forget the wads of paper maps—AllTrails keeps everything you need to plan your outdoor trip on your phone.

item.title: Apple blames EU’s Digital Markets Act for feature delays
item.description: Apple is blaming the EU's enforcement of the DMA for delaying the launch of some features in the EU, saying the rules are "leading to a worse experien...

item.title: Less than 48 hours to grab your TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 ticket savings
